lead_paragraph: The Tampa Bay Lightning are starting to have success at home during a key time, while the St. Louis Blues had another road defeat and lost a goalie, too.

headline.print_headline: Killorn Gets Go-Ahead Goal, Lightning Beat Blues 5-2
headline.main: Killorn Gets Go-Ahead Goal, Lightning Beat Blues 5-2
